reference.title: Starting the console

titlealts.searchtitle: for : Starting the console on the workstation

reference.shortdesc: You can perform all tasks required for configuring your smart cards and for setting a new master key on attached from the console on the workstation.

section.p:
You can configure that the welcome dialog automatically loads on start-up. Click on Launch the web application. Then the initial Trusted Key Entry Console () opens and offers access to a set of commonly used applications and utilities available on the workstation. TKE Console - starting the program
TKE Console - starting the program

section.title: What to do next
section.p: Before you can create and load a master key, you must have completed all sub-tasks described in .
